items.title: Vedanta, Hindustan Zinc shares in green after group denies Viceroy Research's 'Ponzi scheme' allegations
items.description: Vedanta share price: The shares of the company had crashed 8% intraday on July 9 after short seller Viceroy Research said that it has taken a short position on the debt of Vedanta Resources, claiming that it resembles a 'Ponzi scheme'.
